pages.title: Shielding
pages.text: Shielding is a runic power that imbues the wielder's weapon with the $(#389fff)$(l)essence of protection$(). $(br2)It grants the wielder a chance to grant absorption on hit with each successful strike.

Shielding is a powerful runic power that can give the wielder an edge in battle by protecting them from harm. It's ideal for characters that are focused on tanking and absorbing damage, such as warriors and paladins. $(br2)It also can be useful for characters that rely on heavy hitting attacks, as the absorption effect allows them to stay in the fight for longer.
